def_cn: (团体、政党的)正式成员的;持有正式成员证的
def_en: A card-carrying member of a particular group or political party is an official member of that group or party, rather than someone who supports it.

def_cn: 身体力行的;彻头彻尾的
def_en: If you describe someone as, for example, a card-carrying feminist, you are emphasizing the fact that they believe strongly in and try to carry out the ideas of feminism.
